verses.verse: An <S%H4853>oracle.<s%> The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> concerning <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who <S%H5186>stretches<s%> out the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and lays the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H3335>forms<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> him <S%H5002>says:<s%>

<S%H7760>"Behold,<s%> I will make <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> a <S%H5592>cup<s%> of <S%H7478>reeling<s%> to all the <S%H5439>surrounding<s%> <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> and on <S%H3063>Judah<s%> also will it be in the <S%H4692>siege<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

It will happen in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> that I will <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> a <S%H4614>burdensome<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> for all the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%> All who <S%H6006>burden<s%> themselves with it will be severely <S%H8295>wounded,<s%> and all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> will be gathered together against <S%H622>it.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "I will <S%H5221>strike<s%> every <S%H5483>horse<s%> with <S%H8541>terror,<s%> and his <S%H7392>rider<s%> with <S%H7697>madness;<s%> and I will <S%H6491>open<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> on the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and will <S%H5221>strike<s%> every <S%H5483>horse<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> with <S%H5788>blindness.<s%>

The <S%H441>chieftains<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> will <S%H559>say<s%> in their <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H3427><s%> 'The inhabitants of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> are my <S%H556>strength<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>'

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> I will <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H441>chieftains<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> like a <S%H3595>pan<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> among <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and like a <S%H784>flaming<s%> <S%H3940>torch<s%> among <S%H5995>sheaves;<s%> and they will <S%H398>devour<s%> all the <S%H5439>surrounding<s%> <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> on the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> and on the <S%H8040>left;<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> will yet again <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in their own <S%H3389>place,<s%> even in Jerusalem.

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> also will <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7223>first,<s%> that the <S%H8597>glory<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> and the <S%H8597>glory<s%> of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> not be <S%H1431>magnified<s%> above <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H1598>defend<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> He who is <S%H3782>feeble<s%> among them at that <S%H3117>day<s%> will be like <S%H1732>David,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> will be like <S%H430>God,<s%> like the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> before <S%H6440>them.<s%>
It will happen in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> that I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H935>come<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

I will <S%H8210>pour<s%> on the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and on the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H2580>grace<s%> and of <S%H8469>supplication;<s%> and they will <S%H5027>look<s%> to me whom they have <S%H1856>pierced;<s%> and they shall <S%H4553>mourn<s%> for <S%H5594>him,<s%> as one mourns for his <S%H3173>only<s%> <S%H4843>son,<s%> and will grieve bitterly for <S%H4843>him,<s%> as one grieves for his <S%H1060>firstborn.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> there will be a <S%H1431>great<s%> <S%H4553>mourning<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> like the <S%H4553>mourning<s%> of <S%H1910>Hadadrimmon<s%> in the <S%H1237>valley<s%> of <S%H4023>Megiddon.<s%>

The <S%H776>land<s%> will <S%H5594>mourn,<s%> <S%H4940>every<s%> <S%H4940>family<s%> <S%H905>apart;<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H802>apart,<s%> and their wives <S%H4940>apart;<s%> the family of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H802>apart,<s%> and their wives apart;

the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> <S%H802>apart,<s%> and their wives <S%H4940>apart;<s%> the family of the <S%H8097>Shimeites<s%> <S%H802>apart,<s%> and their wives apart;
all the <S%H4940>families<s%> who <S%H7604>remain,<s%> every <S%H4940>family<s%> <S%H802>apart,<s%> and their wives apart.
